com21HcxEth.name: com21HcxEth
com21HcxEth.contactinfo: Network Management Postal: Paul Gordon Com21, Inc. 750 Tasman Drive Milpitas, California 95035 USA Tel: +1 408 953 9100 Fax: +1 408 953 9299 E-mail: pgordon@com21.com
com21HcxEth.description: This is the Com21 ComController Ethernet MIB module. COM21 Part# 005-0025-00

hcxEtherNoPorts.name: hcxEtherNoPorts
hcxEtherNoPorts.description: contains the number of ports supported by the Ethernet card.

hcxEtherHardwareVersion.name: hcxEtherHardwareVersion
hcxEtherHardwareVersion.description: contains the hardware version of the Ethernet card. Will contain empty string if card has not been inserted in the slot.

hcxEtherBootVersion.name: hcxEtherBootVersion
hcxEtherBootVersion.description: contains the version of the Ethernet card boot ROM. Will contain empty string if card has not been inserted in the slot.

hcxEtherUnitPrimServState.name: hcxEtherUnitPrimServState
hcxEtherUnitPrimServState.description: contains primary service state of the Ethernet Unit.

hcxEtherUnitPrimStateChange.name: hcxEtherUnitPrimStateChange
hcxEtherUnitPrimStateChange.description: This trap is generated whenever a change in the the hcxEtherUnitPrimServState occurs. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxEtherUnitSecServState.name: hcxEtherUnitSecServState
hcxEtherUnitSecServState.description: contains a string defining the secondary service states of the Ethernet Unit. The substrings supported by the Ethernet Unit shall be: UNEQ - unequipped.

hcxEtherUnitSecStateChange.name: hcxEtherUnitSecStateChange
hcxEtherUnitSecStateChange.description: This trap is generated whenever a change in the the hcxEtherUnitSecServState occurs. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxEtherRestartAction.name: hcxEtherRestartAction
hcxEtherRestartAction.description: The Ethernet Unit Restart Action is an active-value. The setting of this attribute to restart(2) causes the Ethernet card to reset and download a new image.

hcxEtherTestStatusLed.name: hcxEtherTestStatusLed
hcxEtherTestStatusLed.description: The Ethernet Test Status LED is a read-only attribute which describes the condition of the Ethernet Test Status light emitting diode located on the Ethernet board. A value of on(1) indicates that a service effecting test is in progress and that the LED is illuminated. Will be off if no card present.

hcxEtherTestStatusLedChange.name: hcxEtherTestStatusLedChange
hcxEtherTestStatusLedChange.description: generated whenever there is a change in test LED status. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxEtherFaultStatusLed.name: hcxEtherFaultStatusLed
hcxEtherFaultStatusLed.description: The Ethernet Fault Status LED is a read-only attribute which describes the condition of the Ethernet Fault Status light emitting diode located on the Ethernet board. A value of on(1) indicates that an fault condition has been detected (for which a trap will have been issued) and the LED is illuminated. Will be off if no card present.

hcxEtherFaultStatusLedChange.name: hcxEtherFaultStatusLedChange
hcxEtherFaultStatusLedChange.description: generated whenever there is a change in the Fault LED status. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxEtherSerialNumber.name: hcxEtherSerialNumber
hcxEtherSerialNumber.description: contains the serial number of the Ethernet card. Will contain empty string if card has not been inserted in the slot.

hcxEtherPortShelfId.name: hcxEtherPortShelfId
hcxEtherPortShelfId.description: contains shelf in which this Ethernet port is located.

hcxEtherPortSlotId.name: hcxEtherPortSlotId
hcxEtherPortSlotId.description: contains slot in which this Ethernet port is located.

hcxEtherPortId.name: hcxEtherPortId
hcxEtherPortId.description: contains Ethernet port id. Represents the port number on the card. In the case of single 10baseT or 100baseT, this value will always be 1. In the case of a quad 10baseT card, this value is in the range 1-4.

hcxEtherPortService.name: hcxEtherPortService
hcxEtherPortService.description: contains string defining the service provided by the Ethernet port (VLAN). Set by NMAPS. Default null string. CC most ensure uniqueness.

hcxEtherPortPrimServState.name: hcxEtherPortPrimServState
hcxEtherPortPrimServState.description: contains primary service state of the Ethernet Unit. This state shall be effected by the hcxEtherPortState attribute.

hcxEtherPortPrimStateChange.name: hcxEtherPortPrimStateChange
hcxEtherPortPrimStateChange.description: This trap is generated whenever a change in the the hcxEtherPortPrimServState occurs. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxEtherPortSecServState.name: hcxEtherPortSecServState
hcxEtherPortSecServState.description: contains a string defining the secondary service states of the Ethernet Unit. The substrings supported by the Ethernet Unit shall be: MT - offline, set by hcxEthernetUnitState, FAULT - hardware failure, TEST - test, UNEQ - unequipped.

hcxEtherPortSecStateChange.name: hcxEtherPortSecStateChange
hcxEtherPortSecStateChange.description: This trap is generated whenever a change in the the hcxEtherPortSecServState occurs. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxEtherMaxBandwidth.name: hcxEtherMaxBandwidth
hcxEtherMaxBandwidth.description: This attribute defines the maximum output payload bandwidth associated with the Ethernet port. Defined in thousands of bps. From 0 to 22222. This value shall be checked by the CC which shall ensure that the aggregate of the hcxEtherMaxBandwidth attributes for each of the Ethernet ports does not exceed the system maximum. Note max for 10bT port is 11560. Default: 7000.

hcxEtherAggrDnStrmCbrRate.name: hcxEtherAggrDnStrmCbrRate
hcxEtherAggrDnStrmCbrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort downstream CBR rates configured on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAggrDnStrmPcrRate.name: hcxEtherAggrDnStrmPcrRate
hcxEtherAggrDnStrmPcrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort downstream PCR rates configured on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAggrUpStrmCbrRate.name: hcxEtherAggrUpStrmCbrRate
hcxEtherAggrUpStrmCbrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream CBR rates configured on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAggrUpStrmMinRate.name: hcxEtherAggrUpStrmMinRate
hcxEtherAggrUpStrmMinRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream minimum PCR rates on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAggrUpStrmMaxRate.name: hcxEtherAggrUpStrmMaxRate
hcxEtherAggrUpStrmMaxRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream maximum cell rates on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAgeTime.name: hcxEtherAgeTime
hcxEtherAgeTime.description: This attribute defines, in seconds, the aging time for non-accessed entries in the Bridge mapping table. The default shall be 300secs. If this set to 0, then aging is disabled.

hcxEtherPortConfigState.name: hcxEtherPortConfigState
hcxEtherPortConfigState.description: The Ethernet Port State is an active-value. The Ethernet port will default to offline, in which case no traffic shall be passed. Default offline.

hcxEtherPortRestartAction.name: hcxEtherPortRestartAction
hcxEtherPortRestartAction.description: The Ethernet Port Restart Action is an active-value. The setting of this attribute to restart(2) causes the Ethernet port to reset and download a new image.

hcxEtherPortDiagTestAction.name: hcxEtherPortDiagTestAction
hcxEtherPortDiagTestAction.description: This attribute is used to invoke the internal Ethernet card diagnostic test. In order to activate this test, the card must be placed in the test state.

hcxEtherPortDiagTestComplete.name: hcxEtherPortDiagTestComplete
hcxEtherPortDiagTestComplete.description: This notification is generated whenever the Ethernet port internal diagnostic tests are completed. Event only, no clear. Only severity allowed is WARNING.

hcxEtherPortDiagTestResult.name: hcxEtherPortDiagTestResult
hcxEtherPortDiagTestResult.description: This attribute contains the result of the last Ethernet port diagnostic test.

hcxEtherOperationFailure.name: hcxEtherOperationFailure
hcxEtherOperationFailure.description: This notification is generated by the CC whenever an Ethernet port fails to respond correctly to a request. This failure could indicate either a resource problem or software failure. Note that if an Ethernet card failures to respond completely to a CC request, then a hcxInsertChange trap shall be generated. This is an event without a corresponding clear. Only severity allowed is WARNING.

hcxEtherPortLinkStatusLed.name: hcxEtherPortLinkStatusLed
hcxEtherPortLinkStatusLed.description: The Ethernet Link Status LED is a read-only attribute which describes the condition of the Ethernet Link Status light emitting diode located on the Ethernet board. A value of on(1) indicates that the link is up and active, and that the LED is illuminated. Will be off if no card present.

hcxEtherPortLinkStatusLedChange.name: hcxEtherPortLinkStatusLedChange
hcxEtherPortLinkStatusLedChange.description: generated whenever there is a change in link LED status. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxEtherAggrActDnStrmCbrRate.name: hcxEtherAggrActDnStrmCbrRate
hcxEtherAggrActDnStrmCbrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort downstream CBR rates active on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAggrActDnStrmPcrRate.name: hcxEtherAggrActDnStrmPcrRate
hcxEtherAggrActDnStrmPcrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort downstream PCR rates active on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmCbrRate.name: hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmCbrRate
hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmCbrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream CBR rates active on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmMinRate.name: hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmMinRate
hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmMinRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream minimum PCR rates active on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmMaxRate.name: hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmMaxRate
hcxEtherAggrActUpStrmMaxRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream maximum cell rates active on the Ethernet port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxEtherPortIpAddr.name: hcxEtherPortIpAddr
hcxEtherPortIpAddr.description: IP Address associated with this ethernet port. This is a future item for telephone return support.

hcxEtherPortIpMask.name: hcxEtherPortIpMask
hcxEtherPortIpMask.description: IP mask associated with port. Default is ff.ff.ff.ff. This is a future item for telephone return support.

hcxEtherPortAutoNegEnable.name: hcxEtherPortAutoNegEnable
hcxEtherPortAutoNegEnable.description: This attribute is used for 100BaseT ports ONLY, to enable/disable Auto Negotiation Feature. Default is Auto Negotiation Enable. For 10bT ports this attribute will be read-only with a value of off.

hcxEtherPortSpeedSelect.name: hcxEtherPortSpeedSelect
hcxEtherPortSpeedSelect.description: If 'hcxEtherPortAutoNegEnble' is set to 'off' then the Media speed of the port is set to the value in this attribute. This attribute is valid only for 100BaseT ports - for 10bT ports this attribute shall be read-only with a value of tenMbpsHalfDuplex. Default for 100bT ports is 'hundredMbps'. An error will be returned if PortSpeed is set to 'tenMbps' and 'hcxEtherMaxBandwidth' is greater than 10 Mbps

hcxEtherCurrPortState.name: hcxEtherCurrPortState
hcxEtherCurrPortState.description: specifies the Media speed of the port.

hcxEtherStatsShelfId.name: hcxEtherStatsShelfId
hcxEtherStatsShelfId.description: contains shelf in which the associated Ethernet port is located.

hcxEtherStatsSlotId.name: hcxEtherStatsSlotId
hcxEtherStatsSlotId.description: contains slot in which the associated Ethernet port is located.

hcxEtherStatsPortId.name: hcxEtherStatsPortId
hcxEtherStatsPortId.description: contains the associated Ethernet port id.

hcxEtherCurrCollisions.name: hcxEtherCurrCollisions
hcxEtherCurrCollisions.description: contains the number of detected collisions in the current 15 minute period.

hcxEtherCurrRunts.name: hcxEtherCurrRunts
hcxEtherCurrRunts.description: contains the number of receive runt packets in the current 15 minute period.

hcxEtherCurrGrunts.name: hcxEtherCurrGrunts
hcxEtherCurrGrunts.description: contains the number of received grunt packets in the current 15 minute period.

hcxEtherCurrCrcPkts.name: hcxEtherCurrCrcPkts
hcxEtherCurrCrcPkts.description: contains the number of ethernet packets with CRC errors received in the current 15 minute period.

hcxEtherCurrTxPkts.name: hcxEtherCurrTxPkts
hcxEtherCurrTxPkts.description: contains the number of ethernet packets transmitted in the current 15 minute period.

hcxEtherCurrRxPkts.name: hcxEtherCurrRxPkts
hcxEtherCurrRxPkts.description: contains the number of ethernet packets received in the current 15 minute period.

hcxEtherPrevCollisions.name: hcxEtherPrevCollisions
hcxEtherPrevCollisions.description: contains the number of detected collisions in the previous 15 minute period.

hcxEtherPrevRunts.name: hcxEtherPrevRunts
hcxEtherPrevRunts.description: contains the number of received runt packets in the previous 15 minute period.

hcxEtherPrevGrunts.name: hcxEtherPrevGrunts
hcxEtherPrevGrunts.description: contains the number of received grunt packets in the previous 15 minute period.

hcxEtherPrevCrcPkts.name: hcxEtherPrevCrcPkts
hcxEtherPrevCrcPkts.description: contains the number of ethernet packets received with CRC errors in the previous 15 minute period.

hcxEtherPrevTxPkts.name: hcxEtherPrevTxPkts
hcxEtherPrevTxPkts.description: contains the number of ethernet packets transmitted in the previous 15 minute period.

hcxEtherPrevRxPkts.name: hcxEtherPrevRxPkts
hcxEtherPrevRxPkts.description: contains the number of ethernet packets received in the previous 15 minute period.

hcxEtherClearStats.name: hcxEtherClearStats
hcxEtherClearStats.description: This attribute is used to clear all Ethernet statistics counters in this group. This operation is only possible if the hcxStatsControl attribute is set to wrapCurr.

hcxEtherStuStatsMacAddr.name: hcxEtherStuStatsMacAddr
hcxEtherStuStatsMacAddr.description: Contains IEEE 802 medium access control address of the ComPort device.

hcxEtherStuCurrDnstrmBytes.name: hcxEtherStuCurrDnstrmBytes
hcxEtherStuCurrDnstrmBytes.description: Contains the number of unicast bytes transmitted downstream to this ComPort in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxEtherStuCurrUpstrmBytes.name: hcxEtherStuCurrUpstrmBytes
hcxEtherStuCurrUpstrmBytes.description: Contains the number of bytes received upstream from this ComPort in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxEtherStuCurrUpstrmAal5CrcErrs.name: hcxEtherStuCurrUpstrmAal5CrcErrs
hcxEtherStuCurrUpstrmAal5CrcErrs.description: Contains the number of AAL5 CRC errors related to upstream traffic from the ComPort in the current 15 minute collection period. Each of these errors indicates a dropped Ethernet frame.

hcxEtherStuCurrDnstrmDropPkts.name: hcxEtherStuCurrDnstrmDropPkts
hcxEtherStuCurrDnstrmDropPkts.description: Contains the number of dropped Ethernet frames in the downstream direction in the current 15min period. These frames are generally dropped due to policing.

hcxEtherStuPrevDnstrmBytes.name: hcxEtherStuPrevDnstrmBytes
hcxEtherStuPrevDnstrmBytes.description: Contains the number of unicast bytes transmitted downstream to this ComPort in the last 15 minute collection period.

hcxEtherStuPrevUpstrmBytes.name: hcxEtherStuPrevUpstrmBytes
hcxEtherStuPrevUpstrmBytes.description: Contains the number of bytes received upstream from this ComPort in the last 15 minute collection period.

hcxEtherStuPrevUpstrmAal5CrcErrs.name: hcxEtherStuPrevUpstrmAal5CrcErrs
hcxEtherStuPrevUpstrmAal5CrcErrs.description: Contains the number of AAL5 CRC errors related to upstream traffic from the ComPort in the last 15 minute collection period. Each of these errors indicates a dropped Ethernet frame.

hcxEtherStuPrevDnstrmDropPkts.name: hcxEtherStuPrevDnstrmDropPkts
hcxEtherStuPrevDnstrmDropPkts.description: Contains the number of dropped RX frames in the upstream direction in the previous 15min period.

hcxEtherStuClearStats.name: hcxEtherStuClearStats
hcxEtherStuClearStats.description: This attribute is used to clear all ComPort statistics counters in this group. This operation is only possible if the hcxStatsControl attribute is set to wrapCurr.

hcxEtherIpAddrShelfId.name: hcxEtherIpAddrShelfId
hcxEtherIpAddrShelfId.description: contains shelf in which the associated Ethernet port is located.

hcxEtherIpAddrSlotId.name: hcxEtherIpAddrSlotId
hcxEtherIpAddrSlotId.description: contains slot in which the associated Ethernet port is located.

hcxEtherIpAddrPortId.name: hcxEtherIpAddrPortId
hcxEtherIpAddrPortId.description: contains the associated Ethernet port id.

hcxEtherIpAddrIPAddr.name: hcxEtherIpAddrIPAddr
hcxEtherIpAddrIPAddr.description: target IP Address. No ComPort will be able to use this IP address in an ARP response.

hcxEtherIpAddrIPStatus.name: hcxEtherIpAddrIPStatus
hcxEtherIpAddrIPStatus.description: Used to delete or create an entry.

hcxServGrpAssocShelfId.name: hcxServGrpAssocShelfId
hcxServGrpAssocShelfId.description: defines shelfId to index into this entry. It is the ShelfId where this Service Group has an entry

hcxServGrpAssocSlotId.name: hcxServGrpAssocSlotId
hcxServGrpAssocSlotId.description: defines SlotId to index into this entry. It is the slot where this Service Group has an entry

hcxServGrpAssocCardType.name: hcxServGrpAssocCardType
hcxServGrpAssocCardType.description: defines cardType to index into this entry. It is the card Type where this Service Group has an entry

hcxServGrpAssocPortId.name: hcxServGrpAssocPortId
hcxServGrpAssocPortId.description: defines portId to index into this entry. It is the port number where this Service Group has an entry

hcxServGrpAssocEntryId.name: hcxServGrpAssocEntryId
hcxServGrpAssocEntryId.description: defines entryId to index into this entry. it is the entry number assigned to this service group

hcxServGrpAssocRate.name: hcxServGrpAssocRate
hcxServGrpAssocRate.description: contains Rate associated with this Entry.

hcxServGrpAssocType.name: hcxServGrpAssocType
hcxServGrpAssocType.description: contains Type associated with this Entry.

hcxServGrpAssocNumOfVlans.name: hcxServGrpAssocNumOfVlans
hcxServGrpAssocNumOfVlans.description: contains number of Vlans associated with this Service Group

hcxServGrpAssocNumOfStus.name: hcxServGrpAssocNumOfStus
hcxServGrpAssocNumOfStus.description: contains number of Stus associated with this Service Group
